firmware.name: v2.4 for mk5 w/ relays
firmware.description:
This release is recommended for machines Mk V extruders using relay boards. It includes separate PID settings for the heated platform and the extruder heater.
We recommend setting your PID parameters for the Mk V heaters to P=5,I=0.03,D=35.

firmware.name: v2.4 for unicorn
firmware.description: This firmware is for those using a Unicorn pen plotter toolhead (or for those who want to experiment with servos on the D9 or D10 headers).

firmware.name: v2.3 release 3 w/ stepper support (beta)
firmware.description: This firmware that uses a stepper motor instead of a DC motor to drive the filament. The stepper is driven off the 1A/1B/2A/2B terminals, and half-steps at approx. 40Hz when the speed is set to 255.This is beta firmware only for use with stepper extruders.
